metadata.description: When down-and-out slacker Hunter Prescott inherits a vast fortune from his uncle, he thinks he's got it made. But there's a catch. Hunter has to pick up where his famous treasure-hunting benefactor left off - and find the one artifact Uncle Max never could! Featuring sensational interior art by hot newcomer artist Matt Cossin. Covers by Phil Noto and Rebecca Wrigley.
metadata.name: Hunter's Fortune
